item.description:
This meeting is at my house which is the Idle Dog in Maynard. We have a couple of new members. We will also have homemade squash pie, apple pie, excellent coffee, and a free viewing of some training video that we can all decide on when you all get here. Don't be late.....


Deb
item.how_to_find_us: For directions, see my website: www.theidledog.com

group.name: The Massachusetts Small Breed Dogs Meetup Group

item.name: The Massachusetts Small Breed Dogs November Meetup
